EmailTemplate.name: 201711_Email_Global_BGA_JetConnex Sales Program_JRD.201711_Email_Global_BGA_JetC
EmailTemplate.subject: GoDirect Jet ConneX Incentive Program for Dealers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Valued Dealer:
For a limited time, you can earn up to a $50,000 credit* when you refer a customer to Honeywell's GoDirect Jet ConneX™ who has a JetWave™ high-speed connectivity system and activates their Jet ConneX service package before December 31, 2017.
To learn more about this special sales program, please login to MyAerospace and reference Honeywell sales bulletin HSB 2017-46 for complete program information.
GO TO MYAEROSPACE <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sincerely,
The Honeywell Aerospace Team
*The 2017 dealer incentives apply to orders activated from September 1, 2017 through December 31, 2017, unless otherwise agreed to by Honeywell in writing. Honeywell reserves the right to rescind or revise this sales bulletin or modify through future sales bulletins.
